verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> spake אֱלִיה֗וּ <S%H453><s%> Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> moreover and said

הֲ֭זֹאת <S%H2063><s%> you חָשַׁ֣בְתָּ <S%H2803><s%> Thinkest לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> thou this to be right אָ֝מַ֗רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> [that] thou saidst צִדְקִ֥י <S%H6664><s%> My righteousness מֵאֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תֹ֭אמַר <S%H559><s%> For thou saidst מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יִּסְכָּן־ <S%H5532><s%> What advantage לָ֑ךְ מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֹ֝עִ֗יל <S%H3276><s%> will it be unto thee? [and] What profit מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> sin
אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I אֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֣ <S%H7725><s%> break מִלִּ֑ין <S%H4405><s%> answer וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֶ֥יךָ <S%H7453><s%> thee and thy companions עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

הַבֵּ֣ט <S%H5027><s%> Look שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> unto the heavens וּרְאֵ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> and see וְשׁ֥וּר <S%H7789><s%> and behold שְׁ֝חָקִ֗ים <S%H7834><s%> the clouds גָּבְה֥וּ <S%H1361><s%> [which] are higher מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חָ֭טָאתָ <S%H2398><s%> If thou sinnest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תִּפְעָל־ <S%H6466><s%> what doest בּ֑וֹ וְרַבּ֥וּ <S%H7231><s%> be multiplied פְ֝שָׁעֶ֗יךָ <S%H6588><s%> thou against him? or [if] thy transgressions מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what doest לּֽוֹ׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If צָ֭דַקְתָּ <S%H6663><s%> If thou be righteous מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> what givest ל֑וֹ א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> He יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> thou him? or what receiveth

לְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> [may hurt] a man כָּמ֥וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like רִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7562><s%> Thy wickedness וּלְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> [may profit] the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> as thou [art] and thy righteousness

מֵ֭רֹב <S%H7230><s%> By reason of the multitude עֲשׁוּקִ֣ים <S%H6217><s%> of oppressions יַזְעִ֑יקוּ <S%H2199><s%> they make [the oppressed] to cry יְשַׁוְּע֖וּ <S%H7768><s%> they cry out מִזְּר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> by reason of the arm רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> of the mighty

וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> But none saith אַ֭יֵּה <S%H335><s%> how אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> Where [is] God עֹשָׂ֑י <S%H6213><s%> my maker נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> who giveth זְמִר֣וֹת <S%H2158><s%> songs בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> in the night

מַ֭לְּפֵנוּ <S%H502><s%> Who teacheth מִבַּהֲמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> us more than the beasts אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וּמֵע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> than the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> air יְחַכְּמֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2449><s%> and maketh us wiser

שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There יִ֭צְעֲקוּ <S%H6817><s%> There they cry וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> but none giveth answer מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> because גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> of the pride רָעִֽים׃ <S%H7451><s%> of evil men

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely שָׁ֭וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <S%H8085><s%> will not hear אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> Surely God וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> neither will the Almighty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7789><s%> regard

אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> Although כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תֹ֭אמַר <S%H559><s%> thou sayest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> thou shalt not see דִּ֥ין <S%H1779><s%> him [yet] judgment לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> [is] before וּתְח֥וֹלֵֽל <S%H2342><s%> him therefore trust לֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אַ֭יִן <S%H369><s%> has not פָּקַ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> But now because [it is] not [so] he hath visited אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> in his anger וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> yet he knoweth בַּפַּ֣שׁ <S%H6580><s%> extremity מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [it] not in great

וְ֭אִיּוֹב <S%H347><s%> Therefore doth Job הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in vain יִפְצֶה־ <S%H6475><s%> open פִּ֑יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> his mouth בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without דַ֝֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge מִלִּ֥ין <S%H4405><s%> words יַכְבִּֽר׃ <S%H3527><s%> he multiplieth פ
